import React,{Fragment} from 'react'; import Breadcrumb from '../../../layout/breadcrumb' import { Radar, Line, Bar, Doughnut, Polar } from 'react-chartjs-2'; import { doughnutData, doughnutOption,barChartData, barChartOptions ,lineChartData,lineChartOptions,polarOption,polarData, lineChart2Data,lineChart2option ,data} from './chartsData'; import {Container,Row,Col,Card,CardHeader,CardBody} from "reactstrap"; import {BarChart,LineChart,LineChart2,DoughnutChart,PolarChart,RadarChart} from "../../../constant"; const Charts = (props) => { const datasetKeyProvider = () =>{ return Math.random(); } return (
{BarChart}
{LineChart}
{RadarChart}
{LineChart2}
{DoughnutChart}
{PolarChart}
 ); } export default Charts;
